feat: add stub pages for incomplete features (Phase 3)

- EventsPage: list events with filters, search, export (marked Phase 3)
- ReportsPage: generate reports with CSV/Excel export options (marked Phase 3)
- AdminPanel: manage users, prompts, scheduler with admin-only access (marked Phase 3)
- Updated App.tsx with /events, /reports, /admin routes wrapped with ProtectedRoute
- Updated AppLayout navigation to show all menu items including admin panel link (admin only)
- Created module index.ts exports for events, export, and admin modules
- All Phase 3 pages display clear "in development" messaging to distinguish from broken links

- EventsPage, ReportsPage, and AdminPanel were wrapped in AppLayout twice
- App.tsx already wraps routes with AppLayout, so pages shouldn''t include it

- This fixes the duplicate menu that appeared when navigating to these routes
